summary: A German Marquise has to deal with a pregnancy she cannot explain and an infatuated Russian Count.
cast: Edith Clever|Bruno Ganz|Edda Seippel|Peter Lühr|Otto Sander|Eduard Linkers|Ruth Drexel|Bernhard Frey|Hesso Huber|Erich Schachinger|Richard Rogner|Thomas Straus|Volker Prechtel|Marion Müller|Heidi Möller|Franz Pikola|Theo de Maal|Petra Meier|Manuela Mayer|Éric Rohmer
title: La marquesa de O
